heading: HB07957
0: AN ACT PROVIDING COMPENSATION TO SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN OFFICIALS FURTHER AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 10742 ENTITLED "SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN REFORM ACT OF 2015"
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07957
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING COMPENSATION TO SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN OFFICIALS FURTHER AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 10742 ENTITLED "SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN REFORM ACT OF 2015"
ABSTRACT : Provides that the Sangguniang Kabataan secretary and treasurer shall receive monthly compensation and allowances equivalent to three-fourths (¾ ) of the monthly allowance received by the Sangguniang Kabataan chairman; the Sangguniang Kabataan members shall receive an honorarium equivalent to Five Hundred Pesos (P500) per month.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ERICE, EDGAR R.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-08-29)2. Del Mar (000 2018-09-11)
3. Sangcopan (000 2018-09-19)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2018-08-01
